Package com.edinarobotics.utils.gamepad

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FilteredGamepad
    Implements a Gamepad that filters all of its joystick axis values through a given GamepadFilterSet.
    FilteredThreeAxisJoystick
    Implements a Joystick that filters all of its axis values through a given JoystickFilterSet.
    FilteredTwoAxisJoystick
    Implements a Joystick that filters all of its axis values through a given JoystickFilterSet.
    Gamepad  
    GamepadAxisState
    This class represents the state of all joystick axes of a Gamepad.
    Joystick
    This class implements a simple interface for interacting with a typical joystick.
    JoystickAxisState
    This class represents the state of all axis on a Joystick.
    ThreeAxisJoystick
    This class implements a simple interface for interacting with a 3-axis joystick.
    TwoAxisJoystick
    This class implements a simple interface for interacting with a 2-axis joystick.
